stem: Compression of the tibial nerve in the tarsal tunnel most directly weakens which action?
rationale_correct: Tibial nerve supplies posterior leg (plantarflexors and toe flexors); entrapment weakens plantarflexion.

rationale_distractors.E: Hip abduction is superior gluteal nerve.
